page.title: 12Leisure in N.W.Guildford 2
page.content: Our family belongs to the{Plymouth {Brethren.}My name is Rowena; I am eleven years old and the middle child of a family of six. I seem to spend my spare time either reading, playing board games or peeling potatoes. My elder brother either plays with his friends or listens to his tape recorder. My older sister spends her time reading, doing her school homework or playing table tennis with me. My three younger sisters spend most of their time playing in our garden. My parents do not have much leisure time. Dad is a plumber and spends what little spare time he has gardening. Mum helps him when she can. Being{Brethren}we do not have a television in our house. We spend most of our leisure time together or with our friends.
